meanings.definition: A type of footwear worn by ballet dancers.
meanings.sent1: Ballet dancers wear toeshoes to dance gracefully on their toes.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of toeshoes for her ballet recital.
meanings.sent3: The toeshoes looked like delicate slippers for her feet.
meanings.sent4: Her toeshoes were like magical slippers that helped her dance on air.
meanings.sent5: The toeshoes shimmered under the stage lights, enhancing her performance.

meanings.definition: To put on or wear toeshoes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully toeshoes her feet before every ballet practice.
meanings.sent2: He toeshoes quickly before the ballet performance starts.
meanings.sent3: She always toeshoes with a smile, ready to dance.
meanings.sent4: He toeshoes with determination, knowing he will perform well.
meanings.sent5: Toeshoes on, she twirled gracefully across the stage, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: The act of dancing in toeshoes.
meanings.sent1: Her toeshoes was a beautiful sight as she danced on stage.
meanings.sent2: The toeshoes of the ballerina echoed softly in the theater.
meanings.sent3: The toeshoes added elegance to her already graceful movements.
meanings.sent4: In her toeshoes, she felt like she could conquer the world with her dance.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her toeshoes filled the room, enchanting everyone with her performance.
